title: Is Biden Doing a Much Better Job of Managing the US Economy Than Trump Claims? Paul Krugman Shows the Path to a Soft Landing
description: In a thought-provoking opinion piece for The New York Times, economist Paul Krugman revisits the concept of a “soft landing” in the context of current economic conditions, drawing parallels with historical instances of inflation and economic strategies. title: Social Skills are Next on AI’s Learning Checklist
description: Discover how SOTOPIA-π project is transforming AI, teaching language agents human social skills leading to better interactions and empathy.

title: Financial Revolution Awaits with Top Altcoins
description: A sudden drop in Bitcoin’s price has triggered crypto liquidations worth millions. This sudden movement displays the volatility and risk involved in the crypto market.
